landingOne: Welcome to our platform designed for efficient and seamless management and monitoring of construction sites. You can harness the power of technology to streamline your construction management tasks in several ways.
landingTwo: How can you leverage the Rakival platform?
landingTextOne: Establish your own company profile, through which you can manage all your construction projects from one centralized location
landingTextTwo: Easily add new construction sites to your company profile. Organize and monitor all sites to ensure that all necessary information is readily available to you.
landingTextThree: Expand your team by adding new employees to your company. Each member can access the sites they are assigned to, promoting better coordination and communication.
landingTextFour: Our platform provides tools for real-time construction site management and monitoring, facilitating progress tracking, task management, and ensuring that everything goes according to plan.
landingTextFive: ou also have access to a mobile application, allowing employees to work seamlessly on construction sites, add photos, and record work.
workEntries-btn-worksiteReady-success: The worksite has been marked as completed.
confirmText: Are you sure you want to mark the worksite as completed?
addfloorplanimg-errorNoTitle: You forgot to enter a title or an image
joinCompanyText: You need a company code from an admin-level user.
about-title1: Start for free, expand your possibilities
about-title2: When you are ready to grow, we are here for you
about-text1: Welcome to Rakval work management system, designed to facilitate project management and optimize worksite efficiency. Use our app for free and experience how easy and flexible project management can be. The free version allows you to create and manage up to three worksites, providing an excellent opportunity to explore our app's features without any commitments
about-text2: As your business needs grow, Rakval is ready to support your development. Our paid subscription will be available at the end of 2024, allowing you to create and manage an unlimited number of worksites, providing the scalability and flexibility required by larger projects.
fullorder: Full membership. You can add an unlimited number of worksites.
product-delete-text: Are you sure you want to delete the product?
resetPassword-failTypeError: Password must be at least 6 characters long and include at least one special character
